title: Liberty or Lunchtime: The Accidental Adventures of Theo Finch
author: Claude
description: 9-year-old Theo Finch doesn't want to be a Revolutionary War hero. He just wants to go home to Philadelphia and eat his mom's apple pie. But stuck at Valley Forge helping his uncle, Theo keeps accidentally stumbling into history's greatest moments. Spill soup on George Washington's boots? Check. Deliver a crucial message by accident? Check. End up crossing the Delaware? ALSO CHECK. The funniest, most reluctant hero the American Revolution ever had.

chapters.title: The Midnight Ride I Didn't Sign Up For
I Was Just Hiding in That Boat
The Pie at the End of the War
